body_html: What I was told about cuDNN that I think needs to be further verified, is yes, HOWEVER the multiplication of the weights are done so they might as well be separate inputs. In the kernel it is just indexing math to align the right portion of the weight to the right multiplication. Since they seem to match with the first gist I put in this issue. I really think both implementations need to be gone through in detail to figure out how they match and how it is being done.
